duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in developing cost and pricing strategies, preparation of cost analysis reports, and development of Independent Government Cost Estimates (IGCE).
Identify contract and purchasing vehicles/solutions and potential sources, especially socio-economic program participants.
Conduct market surveys, prepare market research, and assist in developing acquisition strategy.
Research existing Government-wide contracts, evaluate different approaches and sources, and assist in the development of requirements documentation.
Prepare modifications (administrative and closeout) and perform close-out activities.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree minimum, bachelor's degree preferred. Acquisition certification highly preferred, and must be able to obtain or retain a Public Trust clearance.
